name: Criminology & Criminal Justice
descriptions: The Criminology & Criminal Justice minor provides foundational knowledge of the criminal justice system, criminological theory, and related policy. It pairs well with majors in political science, sociology, psychology, and social work.
Students complete two required courses and 12 hours of electives from the CRJU course catalog.

courses: CRJU 20413 - Introduction to Criminal Justice - 3 hrs.
